title: Gregg Allman: Meet the Author
itunes:author: iBooks
itunes:subtitle: Legendary rocker Gregg Allman of The Allman Brothers discusses his memoir, My Cross To Bear, with co-author and music journalist, Alan Light at the Apple Store, Upper West Side.
